accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: You don't have permission to access this area.
accessDenied.message: This area is restricted to platform administrators only. If you believe you should have access, please contact a platform administrator.
accessDenied.contactAdmin: Need access? Contact the platform administrator.

dashboard.title: Platform Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of platform-wide metrics and activity
dashboard.auditNote: All admin actions are logged for security and compliance purposes.

users.title: User Management
users.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, username, or email...
users.showingResults: Showing {count, plural, =0 {no users} =1 {1 user} other {# users}}

organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.showingResults: Showing {count, plural, =0 {no organizations} =1 {1 organization} other {# organizations}}

privacyNote.title: Privacy Notice:
privacyNote.description: For privacy protection, organization internal data is not accessible. Only basic public information (name, member count, creation date) is shown.

actions.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
actions.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for this action.
actions.reasonTooShort: Reason must be at least 10 characters.
actions.reasonPlaceholder: Explain the reason for this action...
actions.reasonNote: This message will be included in the notification sent to the user.
actions.reasonNoteOrg: This message will be sent to all members of the organization.

warn.title: Send Warning
warn.description: Send a warning notification to this user. The user will receive an in-app notification and email.

suspend.title: Suspend Account
suspend.description: Suspend this user's account. They will be unable to log in until their account is restored.

unsuspend.title: Restore Account
unsuspend.description: Restore this user's account. They will be able to log in and use the platform again.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently delete this user's account. This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmNote: This action is irreversible. All user data will be permanently removed.

orgWarnAll.title: Warn All Organization Members
orgWarnAll.description: Send a warning notification to all members of this organization. All members will receive an in-app notification and email.
orgWarnAll.success: Warning sent to all organization members.

orgSuspend.title: Suspend Organization
orgSuspend.description: Suspend this organization and all its members. All members will be unable to log in until the organization is restored.

orgDelete.title: Delete Organization
orgDelete.description: Permanently delete this organization. All members will lose access and organization data will be removed.
orgDelete.confirmNote: This action is irreversible. All organization data will be permanently removed.

feedback.title: User Feedback
feedback.description: Review and manage feedback submitted by users
feedback.searchPlaceholder: Search feedback content, email, or URL...
feedback.showingResults: Showing {count, plural, =0 {no feedback} =1 {1 feedback item} other {# feedback items}}
feedback.adminNotesPlaceholder: Add notes about this feedback (internal use only)...
feedback.noScreenshot: No screenshot was captured for this feedback
feedback.consoleEntries: {count, plural, =1 {1 console entry} other {# console entries}}
feedback.noConsoleLogs: No console logs were captured for this feedback
feedback.consoleLogsCaptured: {count, plural, =1 {1 console log captured} other {# console logs captured}}
feedback.noDiagnosticDataWarning: This bug report was submitted without diagnostic data. The user may not have consented to data capture, or this was submitted before consent was required.
feedback.responsePlaceholder: Write your response to the user...
feedback.responseNote: This message will be sent as a notification to the user.
feedback.responseSent: Response sent successfully! The user has been notified.
feedback.noUserToRespond: Cannot respond to anonymous feedback - no user account found
feedback.anonymousUserNote: This feedback was submitted anonymously. No response can be sent as there is no user account associated.

chat.title: Conversation History
chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation by sending a message.
chat.maxCommentsReached: Maximum number of messages (100) reached for this feedback
chat.noUserToRespond: Cannot send messages to anonymous feedback
chat.anonymousNote: This feedback was submitted anonymously. Messages cannot be sent.
